trans-unit.source: Hosts custom controls or Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: 裝載 (Host) 自訂控制項或 Windows Form 控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> 是抽象的基底類別，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> can host other controls, including custom controls, in two ways:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> 裝載其他控制項，包括自訂控制項，有兩種：

trans-unit.source: Construct a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> with a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 建構<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>與衍生自類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: To fully access the hosted control and properties, you must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A> property back to the actual class it represents.
trans-unit.target: 若要完整存取裝載的控制項和屬性，您必須轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>回到實際屬性類別它代表。

trans-unit.source: Extend <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>, and in the inherited class's default constructor, call the base class constructor passing a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 擴充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>，並繼承的類別預設建構函式中呼叫基底類別建構函式的類別衍生自傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: This option lets you wrap common control methods and properties for easy access in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 此選項可讓您包裝通用控制項的方法和屬性中的輕鬆存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> class to host your customized controls or any other Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>裝載您的自訂的控制項或任何其他 Windows Form 控制項的類別。

trans-unit.source: To customize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> and create a custom implementation.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>並建立自訂的實作。

trans-unit.source: You can override methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A> to handle events raised by the hosted controls, and you can put custom functionality into properties to enhance the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以如覆寫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>來處理事件引發所裝載的控制項，並置於屬性來強化裝載的控制項的自訂功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A> to handle events, and exposing some of its members to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.OnSubscribeControlEvents%2A>來處理事件，而且已公開它的某些成員至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> hosted by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 由這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 類別所裝載的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> class that hosts the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> 類別的新執行個體，而這個類別會裝載指定的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> control and setting several properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>控制項，並設定數個屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `toolStrip1` and call `InitializeDateTimePickerHost` from the form's constructor or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名為`toolStrip1`呼叫`InitializeDateTimePickerHost`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The control referred to by the <paramref name="c" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="c" /> 參數所參考的控制項為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> hosted by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 由這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 類別所裝載的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> class that hosts the specified control and that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> 類別的新執行個體，而這個類別會裝載指定的控制項且具有指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在控制項中顯示的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示要在控制項背景中顯示之影像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <see langword="ImageLayout" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 <see langword="ImageLayout" /> 列舉類型中所定義的背景影像配置。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" />:
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 的其中一個值：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout.Tile" /> (default)
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout.Tile" /> (預設值)

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得指示能否選取控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can be selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以選取控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出在裝載控制項取得焦點時，裝載控制項是否會導致並引發其他控制項的驗證事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosted control causes and raises validation events on other controls when the hosted control receives focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝載控制項取得焦點時，裝載控制項會導致並引發其他控制項的驗證事件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 所裝載的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> is hosting.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 所裝載的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> control and sets a property on the wrapped control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>控制，並且設定屬性的已包裝的控制項使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Control%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `toolStrip1` and call `InitializeDateTimePickerHost` from the form's constructor or the `Load` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名為`toolStrip1`呼叫`InitializeDateTimePickerHost`從表單的建構函式或`Load`事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the control on the form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表單上控制項的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.ControlAlign%2A> property to determine or define how hosted controls are to be laid out on the form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.ControlAlign%2A>屬性來判斷或定義如何裝載的控制項的配置表單上。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.ControlAlign" /> property is set to a value that is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.ControlAlign" /> 屬性沒有設定成其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: 為控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.DefaultSize%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the control when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.DefaultSize%2A>屬性代表<xref:System.Drawing.Size>最初建立時的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> is `true`, the control is sized automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> orientation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>是`true`，控制項的大小調整為自動根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>方向。

trans-unit.source: You can manually adjust the size of the control by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A> property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以手動調整控制項大小藉由設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>屬性值設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 為了維護更佳的效能，您不應將<xref:System.Drawing.Size>其建構函式中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 慣用的方法是覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.DefaultSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.DefaultSize" /> property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> with the desired dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.DefaultSize" />衍生類別中的屬性，最好是傳回<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />所需的維度，而不是覆寫所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The display style of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的顯示樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see langword="Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.target: 如果啟用按兩下，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the parent control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hosted control is entered.
trans-unit.target: 發生於輸入裝載控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Enter> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Enter>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> named `ToolStripControlHost1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>名為`ToolStripControlHost1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Enter> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Enter>事件。

trans-unit.target: 如果控制項擁有輸入焦點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於裝載控制項上的字型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> control and setting several properties.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Validated> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Validated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> named `ToolStripControlHost1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>名為`ToolStripControlHost1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Validated> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost.Validated>事件。
